company.name: E2M Solutions
company.description: A full-service white label digital agency that partners with other digital agencies to help them scale and grow their businesses.
company.mission: To empower digital agency owners to achieve business growth with peace of mind and attain freedom in both their professional and personal lives.
company.vision: To become a leading and preferred white label partner for digital agencies.
company.experience: Over 13 years of experience, serving over 400 agency partners and completing more than 8,000 projects.

services.name: Website Design and Development
services.details: White label web design and development services for WordPress, Shopify, BigCommerce, and WooCommerce. Includes unlimited projects and revisions with fast turnaround.

services.name: E-commerce Solutions
services.details: Specialized development for online stores using top platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce.

services.name: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
services.details: Comprehensive SEO services including AI SEO, Local SEO, and eCommerce SEO to improve search visibility.

services.name: PPC (Pay-Per-Click)
services.details: White label PPC management to drive targeted traffic and conversions.

services.name: AI Consulting & Automation
services.details: Fractional AI consulting and implementation of AI-driven automation workflows.

services.name: Content Writing
services.details: High-quality white label content creation for blogs, websites, and marketing materials.

services.name: Maintenance & Support
services.details: IT hosting, server administration, and ongoing website maintenance/support services.
